Class IgnoredNames

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.configuration.IgnoredNames
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class IgnoredNames extends Object implements Serializable
wrapper class for IgnoredFiles and IgnoredDirs.

Vladimir Kotal

    • add

      public void add(String pattern)
      Adds the specified pattern if it follows the expected naming convention (or else ignored).
      Parameters:
      pattern - defined pattern starting either with "f:" for ignore-file or with "d:" for an ignore-directory

    • ignore

      public boolean ignore(File file)
      Should the file be ignored or not?
      Parameters:
      file - the file to check
      Returns:
      true if this file should be ignored, false otherwise

    • ignore

      public boolean ignore(String name)
      Should the file name be ignored or not ?
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the file to check
      Returns:
      true if this pathname should be ignored, false otherwise
